summary: Motivated Junior DevOps Engineer with 1.5 years of experience in cloud infrastructure and automation. Recently completed DevOps bootcamp and eager to apply CI/CD best practices in production environments. Strong foundation in Linux administration, containerization, and infrastructure as code. Quick learner with a passion for automation and continuous improvement.

experience.title: Junior DevOps Engineer
responsibilities: Maintain and monitor AWS infrastructure for 3 client applications
Write Bash and Python scripts to automate deployment tasks
Assist in managing Docker containers and basic Kubernetes deployments
Configure Jenkins pipelines for automated testing and deployment
Troubleshoot Linux server issues and perform routine maintenance

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert
